title: 112_hr6521
content: MEDICAID COVERAGE FOR PATIENT NAVIGATOR SERVICES. State Plan Requirement amended to include reimbursement for patient navigator services provided to eligible individuals under the State plan. Patient Navigator Services Definitions are also outlined in the section. The State Plan Requirement is amended to include reimbursement for patient navigator services provided to eligible individuals. The Patient Navigator Services Definitions specify the requirements for an eligible entity to comply with. The term 'patient navigator' is defined in section 340A(l)(3) of the Public Health Service Act. The Secretary will consult with the patient navigation advisory committee to clarify this definition and establish training requirements for patient navigators. The Secretary will convene a patient navigation advisory committee with representatives from relevant Federal departments and agencies to develop a training curriculum for patient navigators. The curr_chunk discusses the definition of patient navigator services and their inclusion as medical assistance under the Social Security Act. This is part of a broader effort to establish a patient navigation advisory committee for training patient navigators. The curr_chunk introduces patient navigator services as defined in section 1902(ll)(3) of the Social Security Act, with requirements outlined in section 1902(a)(84). The effective date for these services to be provided is after the first day of the first calendar year following the enactment of the Act, with exceptions for State legislation if needed for compliance. The respective plan is not required to meet additional requirements before the first day of the first calendar quarter after the State legislature's session following the enactment of the Act. Each year of a 2-year legislative session is considered a separate regular session.
